definitions.definition: a room or part of a building in which people work, especially sitting at tables with computers, phones, etc., usually as a part of a business or other organization:

examples: They have offices in Paris, London, and Madrid.

definitions.definition: a place where you can go to ask advice from or receive treatment from a doctor or dentist:
examples: The doctor does not make house calls - you will have to come to her office.

definitions.definition: a department of the national government in Britain, or an official government organization:
